Amazon has its most affordable config at $250 off as of this morning and that particularly notable 24GB model over at B&H is still down at $1,549, but we wanted to make sure this Woot refurb on the M4 Pro was on your radar too – it’s now $700 off the new list price.

items.title: EcoFlow’s next 48-hour flash sale drops expanded DELTA 2 Max bundle to second-best $1,469, more from $799
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale, which only lasts a few more days, EcoFlow has launched another 48-hour flash sale with up to 60% savings on four offers, one of which gives you the DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station with a smart extra battery for $1,469 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $30. It boasts a $3,298 full price tag, though you can often find it starting around $2,149 at Amazon. We’ve mostly been seeing the price kept down at $1,499 since November, with a short-term dip to the $1,424 low during the final week lead-up to Cyber Monday. If you missed out on that low, you’re getting the next-best price here through December 23, with $680 off the going rate ($1,829 off the MSRP). Head below to browse the full flash sale lineup lasting through tomorrow night.

more…

items.title: Baseus’ originally $90 10,000mAh Qi2.2 25W power bank with built-in cable is 50% off today at $45
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Baseus’ official Amazon storefront offering its 10,000mAh Picogo Qi2.2 25W power bank for $45.49 shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo code FK3CMQZF during checkout to see the discounted price. This is originally a $90 battery pack that has lately been fetching $70 at Amazon. We’ve seen it drop to the $53 mark, but the promo code takes an additional $8 off to deliver a 50% markdown. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this power bank, and it happens to be one of the most affordable Qi2.2 25W battery packs out there right now. More details below.

items.title: Charge your EV almost anywhere with Schumacher’s level 1 portable 120V charger at a new $104 low
items.summary:
Update 12/22: Amazon has dropped the price further on this portable EV charger to a new all-time low of $104 shipped.

Amazon is offering EV drivers the chance to pick up the Schumacher SEV1670 Electric Level 1 Portable EV Charger for $105.34 shipped. While it has carried a $160 MSRP since hitting the market over the summer, we’ve been seeing it keep down at $130 since the tail-end of August, with discounts having gone as low as $110 back during Black Friday/Cyber Monday sales. Now, you’re getting an even better price here today with enough time to have it delivered before Christmas, saving you $25 off the recent going rate ($55 off the MSRP) that lands it at a new all-time low price. Below, you can also find some of the brand’s EV charging stations to install at your home.

items.title: PlayStation Store now offering first deal on Hollow Knight Silksong at $16, also available on Steam
items.summary:
Today’s game deals roundup is certainly featuring Nintendo Switch 2 consoles down at the $449.99 Black Friday price again at Amazon and Best Buy, but we also wanted to highlight the price drop on the wonderful Hollow Knight: Silksong. One of the most long-awaited games in recent history, the PlayStation is now offering the first chance to save on what was already quite an affordably-priced gem – regularly $20, it is currently sitting down at $15.99 with 20% in savings for anyone who hasn’t given this one a go yet. This same price is also available on Steam for PC gamers as well.

Team Cherry announces Hollow Knight Switch 2 Edition, teases FREE Silksong expansion

items.title: Downtime, No Answers: The Chronic Silence Of Banks And Telcos In Malaysia
items.summary:
